checkCronjobs().details: Calls executeCronjob() at the most 1 cronJob per tx

params.lateApplicationsForInvestmentDuration_: duration for late applications for investment
params.superDelegator_: The address of the admin in charge during the first epoch

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.projectId: The id of the investment or investment to approve

startLotteryPhase(uint256).details: First check if the lottery should start

params.projectId: The id of the project to update
The id of the investment to store

superVoteForRequest(uint256,bool).details: Executes cronJobrequires msg.sender to be Super Delegatorrequires current epoch to be 0 or 1

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateSuperDelegator(address).details: This function is used to update the superDelegator address.

params.superDelegator_: The address of the upgraded super delegator.

checkCronjobs().notice: Checks if needs to execute a DAO cronJob

requestApproval(uint256).notice: Request a investment or investment approval
